m_szDocTitle: Patent US20110254503 - Wireless power antenna alignment adjustment system for vehicles - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract Exemplary embodiments are directed to wireless charging and wireless power alignment of wireless power antennas associated with a vehicle. A wireless power charging apparatus includes an antenna including first and second orthogonal magnetic elements for detecting a horizontal component of a magnetic field generated from a second charging base antenna. A processor determines a directional vector between the antennas.  Images(37)                                       Claims(42) 1. A method, comprising: detecting at least a portion of at least one signal
